Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing in both directions near the area of Garfield due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing in both directions near the area of Garfield due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include:
#3 king Drive
#4 Cottage Grove
#29 State

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
